Edges-Background -- Male Human Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (11 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes: Obese: -1 Strength step (worn gear)
Skills (16 Points):
Academics: (sma) d6 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d8-1 Survival: (sma) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Research: (sma) d4 Taunt: (sma) d6
Fighting: (agi) d6 Riding: (agi) d4
Focus: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Favored Enemy: May reroll Survival to track 1 chosen creature type
Favored Terrain: May reroll Notice and Survival in 1 chosen terrain
Size: 1
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 12; Skill: 4
Description Notes: Obese: +1 Size
Features
Edges (7 points): Arcane Resistance; Chosen; Favored Enemy; Favored Terrain; Fey Blood; Heirloom; Improved Arcane Resistance Hindrances: Doubting Thomas; Mean; Obese; Shamed Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Chosen: Has Enemy+ feature
Chosen-1: Permanent mark shows Chosen status
Doubting Thomas: Insists on rationalizing supernatural events
Enemy+: Powerful individual or group wants character eliminated
Heirloom: Possesses 1 powerful magic item
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Combat
Parry: 6 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (0) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: None Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Cutlass (d8+d6); Falchion (d8+d8 AP 1); Scythe (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Improved Arcane Resistance: Increased Arcane Resistance effects
Obese: -1 Pace/-1 Run step/+1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Arcane Resistance: Foes suffer -4 arcane skill and arcane damage when targeting self
Chosen: Conviction effects last until end of encounter
Favored Enemy: May reroll attacks against 1 chosen creature type
Favored Terrain: Gains additional Action Card in 1 chosen terrain
Fey Blood: May reroll when resisting enemy powers and spell-like effects
